lead_paragraph: While the governor says he has been addressing economic and educational problems, he may be forced into the immigration debate by the State Legislature.

headline.print_headline: Arizona May Face New Pressure After Shifting Immigration Focus
headline.main: Gov. Doug Ducey of Arizona Shifts Focus From Immigration Debate

snippet: While the governor says he has been addressing economic and educational problems, he may be forced into the immigration debate by the State Legislature.
abstract: Divisive debate on immigration expands in Arizona with introduction of three tough new legislative proposals in state with growing Latino population and laws that are already among nation's hardest on illegal immigrants; both sides are waiting for any action by Gov Doug Ducey, who has, in his second year in office, avoided political pressures to confront issue.
